Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.message.stocmessage

Class RematchOfferedMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.message.Message
it.polimi.ingsw.network.message.stocmessage.StoCMessage
it.polimi.ingsw.network.message.stocmessage.RematchOfferedMessage
public class RematchOfferedMessage extends StoCMessage
This class implements the RematchOfferedMessage from server to client. It is sent when the server receives the first RematchMessage from one player in the match. Message structure: { nickname, rematch proposer }
